import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import ProductCategoriesGirl from "./ProductCategoriesGirl"; import './BabyProduct.css'; import Navbar from "../Navbar"; import Footer from "../Footer"; const BabyGirl = () => { const [data,setData]=useState(ProductCategoriesGirl); const filterResult=(catItem)=>{ const result=ProductCategoriesGirl.filter((curData)=>{ return curData.category===catItem; }); setData(result); } return( <>

{/* carousel slider */}
Gentle & Safe Diapers

Gentle on baby skin U-shaped absorbent core to protect toddlers from leaks during active play moments

Best Toys for Babies

We deals in wide range of toys, soft toys, Musical toys, Learning and educational toys

Clothing & Shoes

Highest quality clothes and shoes for newborn, infant and toddlers at affordable price

{/* carousel Slide end */}

Shop by Categories



{/* Size Button starts */}
{/* Size Button ends */}
{data.map((values)=>{ const {id, name, price, productPicture1, productPicture2, reviews, size}=values; return( <>
  • {reviews}

{name}

{price}
{size}



) })}




); } export default BabyGirl;
